content.body: PSA relayed from TabAtkins : Bikeshed's reference database has changed. https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/spec-prod/2023JanMar/0004.html . I suspect some of our specs may need small updates and will break on the next build.

PSA relayed from TabAtkins : Bikeshed's reference database has changed. https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/spec-prod/2023JanMar/0004.html . I suspect some of our specs may need small updates and will break on the next build.

content.body: Also this means the JavaScript spec is in the database now which is huge!!!

content.body: I've done some checks on whatwgv specs and preemptively fixed some obvious data issues, but I didn't try building all of them, so yeah just let me know if there are issues
